item.title: Why only 2% of applicants actually get interviews
item.description:
Why only 2% of applicants actually get interviews

Written by Peter Harris Posted on December 1, 2015 I was doing a radio interview this morning. I thought the topic was going to be hiring trends for 2016, but the first question that the host asked me was, "what are the biggest mistakes that job seekers make."

item.title: It takes 16 weeks to get a new job - Workopolis
item.description:
It takes 16 weeks to get a new job - Workopolis

Written by Elizabeth Bromstein Posted on April 21, 2014 Is it taking a while for you to find a job? Don't get frustrated. Getting work takes time. Job searches can last anywhere from two days to over a year, but for most people the quest lasts roughly four months.
